intro_text: Your patrol notices new leaves and flowers starting to grow
success_text: The hunting is plentiful as new prey is born
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head home early

intro_text: r_c notes that it is a beautiful day outside, birds are singing and flowers are blooming
success_text: On days like these, patrolling is very pleasant
fail_text: On days like these, cats are too lazy to patrol
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head home early

intro_text: The patrol approaches a deep ravine. There is a lot of prey here, but the ground is very slippery from newleaf rain
success_text: The patrol has a very successful hunt
fail_text: While hunting, r_c slips and falls into the ravine, never to be seen again
decline_text: The patrol decides to hunt elsewhere

intro_text: A large river divides the Clan's territory and the water is high from newleaf rain. Should your patrol cross it?
success_text: The patrol crosses the river and the rest of the patrol goes smoothly
fail_text: r_c is swept away from the strong current and drowns
decline_text: The patrol decides it is too dangerous to cross right now
